name: Sun Wheel: Fire Damage
desc:
When you use the shield spell granted by the sun wheel to prevent damage, if the attacker is adjacent to you, you can choose to deal |dice=2d6 Fire| 2d6 fire damage to it, which it gets a DC 21 basic Reflex save to resist.

If you choose to deal the fire damage, you can't Activate the sun wheel again until the next morning.
